name: Invalid login attempt to the portal [test_user@mitigram.com-<BLANK>-Password is required]

steps.name: Given User is on the application home page
When User performs login with "test_user@mitigram.com" and "<BLANK>"
Then Login attempt should fail with the message "Password is required"
